author: jerenkrantz
msg: "Pass me down a paper bag" follow up to r36172.

author: stsp
msg: On the 1.6.x branch:
* STATUS: Nominate r36178 for 1.6.1.

author: rhuijben
msg: For issue #2544, 'fix' the default svn blame behavior to blame to the working
copy version of a file.
* subversion/svn/blame-cmd.c
(svn_cl__blame): Use svn_opt_revision_working as end revision if no other
revision is specified.

author: stsp
msg: Revive external merge-tool improvements reverted in r36147,
and make additional changes. And don't break the test suite this time.
Pass the name of the conflicted file to the external merge tool.
Allow the merge tool to abort the merge by using an exit code
other than 0 or 1. Fix a bug where a file was still conflicted
but marked as M instead of C.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/svneditor.py
(main): Assume new argument wc_path.
Exit with exit code 0 only if no conflicts are left in the
edit result, and with exit code 1 otherwise.
(check_conflicts): New function.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/update_tests.py
(update_accept_conflicts): Adjust for new behaviour of svneditor.py.
Do not expect svn to have successfully merged files which still
contain conflict markers, this was a bug, not desired behaviour!!!
Turns out just because svn prints a 'G' does not necessarily mean
it knows what it is doing...
* subversion/svn/cl.h
(svn_cl__merge_file_externally): Add new arguments wc_path and
remains_in_conflict.
* subversion/svn/util.c
(svn_cl__merge_file_externally): Pass wc_path to the external merge tool,
and set *remains_in_conflict based on the tool's exit code.
Error out if the merge tool exists with an exit code other than 0 or 1.
* subversion/svn/conflict-callbacks.c
(launch_resolver): Track changes made to argument list of
svn_cl__merge_file_externally().
(svn_cl__conflict_handler): As previous, and also correctly set
the merge result choice to 'postpone' instead of 'merged' if
the file is left in conflict. Don't clear errors, other than
SVN_ERR_CL_NO_EXTERNAL_EDITOR, thrown from
svn_cl__merge_file_externally() anymore. These are now real
errors and we want to abort the merge.
* subversion/include/svn_io.h
(svn_io_wait_for_cmd): Better document under what conditions callers
can expect to retrieve the exit code of the child process.
Based on patches by John Gardiner Myers <jgmyers@proofpoint.com>
Additional input by: julianfoad
sbutler

author: rhuijben
msg: * subversion/tests/libsvn_subr/dirent_uri-test.c
(test_uri_canonicalize, test_uri_is_canonical): Add a few test pairs.
